attributes.action: Lower the DSA practical test charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The price to conduct the driving test of £48.50 is just a lucrative money making scheme and should be lowered to make such, an affordable experience for all.  For Chelmsford alone, the turnover is £500,000 a year - stop the stealth tax!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
